title: Grand Portage National Monument: Road Closures
body: Road Closures        A hike in the fall along the Grand Portage, draws the eye upward to the abundant stands of green crowned quaking aspen and yellow crowned paper birch, don't trip over their roots while doing so! NPS Photo / Lloyd "Pick" Dibbern   Â    Access to the upper reaches of the Grand Portage by automobile is through County Road 17 and Old Highway 61 to the signed Grand Portage National Monument trailhead. Other roads within Grand Portage Indian Reservation are administered by the Reservation Tribal Council through Grand Portage Trust Lands. We recommend you contact Grand Portage Lodge and Casino 218-475-2401 and obtain permission before using other roads.
